room_title: Escape room "The Quest" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: I've been to a number of different escape room places and this one is the best by far! I've taken other people to this one and they all say it's the best one they've done as well.

room_title: Escape room "The Quest" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: This was so much fun and really hard. Even with clues we maxed out our time. Call to find out which room is easiest and hardest. Then choose that way! We took the best picture afterward. Lots of fun!

room_title: Escape room "The Quest" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: Had a great experience! Our host and Clue guy was amazing I recommend that everyone try this place at least once. Can not have asked for a better experience
